## Medical data is very important

There are tears of patients and doctors in **Medical data**

-   Develop knowledge & technology that can save the world    
-   The less we use medical data, the more patients are dead


## Medical research surge

With Covid19 

-  Medical research has doubled.

-  Clinical trials for new drugs are also on the rise

-  Digital Therapeutics(DTx), decentralized clinical trial(DCT) 


## No service for medical research

-  Doctors don't have time to analyze their data
-  Statistical software is not specialized in medical research


**Doctors need fast, easy-to-use and medical-specific service**
